--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Rodimus struggles to look up at Cyclonus. He tries to activate his
> optics lasers but there no energy left and they fizzle out. He head
> slumps again. Rodimus Prime has indeed been beaten.

Cyclonus' tilted his head slightly as he watched Rodimus, not quite
sure if this was a ruse or not. It is as Rodimus' head slumps, Cyclonus
nods to himself, as he realized that the battle was over. A quick
glance at Rodimus' chest tells him that severe battle damage would not
allow it to be opened giving him direct access to the matrix that was
held within, but Cyclonus knew that there was another way. 

Carefully Cyclonus approached Rodimus, hands held before him, fingers
held out. In his palms his hand cannons seemed to almost retract or
even open revealing twin black holes, the same feature he displayed
near the end of his last battle when he absorbed the energy of the
missiles, but here his bleed back receptors were to put to a much
different use. Placing his palms on Rodimus' chest Cyclonus prepared
himself, mentally shifting and recalibrating the receptors, and then
with a specific act of will he activated them!

In spectacular arcs of power, energy laced itself around Cyclonus and
Rodimus as power flowing from Rodimus into Cyclonus through Cyclonus
hands on Rodimus' chest. A grim look apeared on Cyclonus face as he
stared into the optics of the defeated Rodimus, for the briefest moment
a strange look appeared on Cyclonus' face, Triumph? Remorse? It was
gone before it could be identified. What repalced it was a steel mask
of victory as the powerful Unicron herald began to leech the power of
the matrix from Rodimus Prime's chest!

OOC: Will Remus be interfearing??

Preston
(Cyclonus)
